input: Which of the following statements regarding the Fundamental Duties contained in the Indian Constitution are correct? P. Fundamental duties can be enforced through writ jurisdiction. Q. Fundamental duties have formed a part of the Indian Constitution since its adoption. R. Fundamental duties became a part of the Constitution in accordance with the recommendations of the Swaran Singh Committee. S. Fundamental duties are applicable only to citizens of India.
